pages.text: The passive creatures known as $(thing)Wulders$() wander the $(thing)Snowy Zones$() of the $(thing)Misty World$().$(br2)Killing a $(thing)Wulder$() grants 2 $(thing)Cutting$() experience.$(br2)They can be tamed and bred using $(item)Snow Tree Saplings$(), requiring $(thing)Taming level 3$(). Once tamed, they can be sheared, milked, and ridden when equipped with a saddle.
